title: That all may learn
creator_credit: United Nations. Dept. of Public Information
brief_description: The human story of a Mexican farmer and his family, who are exploited because they cannot read or write, is used as a case to stress the need for education of all the peoples the world over. Unesco’s part in correcting these conditions is portrayed.
